product_name: Merrell Parlee Half-Sleeve Top - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Casual and comfortable, the Merrell Parlee Half-Sleeve top is perfect for every day and travel forays. Stretchy, soft and wrinkle-resistant fabric feels smooth and light and dries quickly. Polyester/rayon blend fabric breathes well. Hugging sleeve cuffs and a relaxed body give you a just-right, fun fit. Closeout.
short_description: Casual and comfortable, the Merrell Parlee Half-Sleeve top is perfect for every day and travel forays. Stretchy, soft and wrinkle-resistant fabric feels smooth and light and dries quickly.
